Creating a query

query GDCQuery cases files projects annotations

Start a query of GDC metadata

Manipulating a query

filtering filter filter.GDCQuery get_filter get_filter.GDCQuery

Manipulating GDCQuery filters

facet get_facets get_facets.GDCQuery

Set facets for a GDCQuery

select select.GDCQuery

S3 generic to set GDCQuery fields

Introspection on the GDC API fields

mapping

Query GDC for available endpoint fields

available_fields available_fields.GDCQuery available_fields.character

S3 Generic to return all GDC fields

default_fields default_fields.character default_fields.GDCQuery

S3 Generic to return default GDC fields

grep_fields

Find matching field names

available_values

Find common values for a GDC field

available_expand available_expand.character available_expand.GDCQuery

Return valid values for "expand"

Executing an API call to retrieve query results

results results.GDCQuery results.GDCResponse

results

count count.GDCQuery count.GDCResponse

provide count of records in a GDCQuery

response GDCResponse response.GDCQuery response_all

Fetch GDCQuery metadata from GDC

Raw data file downloads

gdcdata

Download GDC files

transfer transfer_help

Bulk data download

gdc_client

return gdc-client executable path

Summarizing and aggregating field values (faceting)

aggregations aggregations.GDCQuery aggregations.GDCResponse

aggregations

Authentication

gdc_token

return a gdc token from file or environment

BAM file slicing

slicing

Query GDC for data slices
